message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're being too generous, I'll take the majority!
You're being greedy, I'll give you a bigger chunk this time!
I'll give you a small piece, but you're getting smaller and smaller!
You're getting too aggressive, let's meet in the middle again!
You're running out of time, I'm taking what's left!
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a slightly bigger piece this time!
You're almost out of time, don't expect much!
You're really low-balling me now, I'll give you a tiny bit more!
You're almost out of time, take it or leave it!
You're really squeezing me now, I'll give you a tiny bit more!
Last chance, take it or we both get nothing!
